scripts.build: echo 'Root build script - use build-all instead' && exit 1
scripts.build-all: npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:portfolio
scripts.build:portfolio: cd portfolio && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && CI=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true node -e "process.chdir('portfolio'); require('./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts');" build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && node -e "process.chdir('frontend'); require('./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts');" build
